original_text: Moses and Aaron went from the assembly to the entrance to the tent of meeting and fell facedown, and the glory of the Lord appeared to them.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 회중 앞을 떠나 회막 문에 이르러 엎드리매 여호와의 영광이 그들에게 나타나며

sentences.original_text: Moses and Aaron went from the assembly
to the entrance to the tent of meeting
and the glory of the Lord appeared to them
